Title: Better With Age
Description:
It is a crime to harvest the young trees, but a much bigger crime to waste the amber.

Young amber is not as strong, but the Klaxxi need it to continue the fight. We will bring them more and they will sing my praises!

Gather the young amber. We will store it until it is aged and can be consumed.
ObjectivesText: Gather 7 Amber-Filled Jars from the Amber Collectors on the Stinging Trail.
CompletionText: I would go with you to gather amber, but my talents are more useful here.
RewardText:
Even this raw amber will be of use. We can't afford to be picky in times like these.

The Klaxxi'va will be glad I thought of this. I will tell them you helped!
